module.name: Call Cost
module.description:
Allows configuration of call cost for different destinations and after that assing cost for each CDR records.
For example, you can assing different cost for mobile and landline calls.
module.attention: If you'd like to automaticaly generate and keep up-to-date cdrcost table link cdrcost into /etc/cron.d/ eg: ln -s /var/www/html/admin/modules/cdrcost/cdrcost /etc/cron.d/ this script will generate asteriskcdrdb's cdrcost table record up-to-date.
module.changelog: *0.4 a few bugfix based on response. *0.1* First release
